name: rudolf
notes:
**christmas knit-along: rudolf yoke sweater**
get into the holiday spirit by knitting the ultimate christmas sweater! designed by minna metsänen, the rudolf yoke sweater is this season's top knit for every christmas lover, regardless of age or gender. skillfully crafted, this sweater is knit with 7 veljestä yarn, seamlessly from the top down, starting at the yoke. cheerful red-nosed reindeer and other festive motifs bring holiday joy with every stitch.

the **knit-along** starts on november 18th. the pattern is published in seven parts, the last part is published on december 9th.

**sizes**
the sizes correspond to each other. women's s = men's xs
**women's s(m)l(xl)2xl(3xl)4xl(5xl)
men's xs(s)m(l)xl(2xl)3xl(4xl)**

sample size is women's size m

**finished measurements**

bust circumference 92(100)108(116)124(132)140(148) cm / 36.25(39.5)42.5(45.75)48.75(52)55(58.25) inches

sweater length at center back women's 58(60)62(64)66(68)70(72) cm / 22.75(23.5)24.5(25.25)26(26.75)27.5(28.25) inches

sweater length at center back men's 67(69)71(72)73(74)75(76) cm / 26.5(27.25)28(28.25)28.75(29.25)29.5(30) inches

sleeve inner length women's 46(47)48(49)50(50)51(52) cm / 18(18.5)18.75(19.25)19.75(19.75)20(20.5) inches

sleeve inner length men's 50(51)52(53)53(54)55(55) cm / 19.75(20)20.5(20.75)20.75(21.25)21.75(21.75) inches

**yarn demand**

**note.** for men's pullover reserve an extra skein (587) cranberry 100 g, since you need more yarn than in women's version. 

**novita 7 veljestä**
(587) cranberry 300(350)350(400)450(500)550(600) g
(011) white 250(300)300(350)400(450)500(550) g
(618) sandbank 50(100)100(100)150(150)150(200) g
(375) bergenia 50(50)50(50)100(100)100(150) g
(064) false morel 20(20)30(30)40(40)50(50) g

needles and other supplies

**circular needles** (40, 60, and 80 cm) novita **3.5 mm** and **4 mm** or according to your gauge, **double-pointed needles** 3.5 mm and 4 mm for the sleeves if you’re not using the magic loop, and stitch markers.

**design minna metsänen**
